description:
Kei is accepted into a unique school, Soumei remembers the pups’ youth, and the Don accepts a hitman contract.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Acceptance into Hair Cuticle Academy / Cuticle Life: The Idiot Sons / Bar Ragdoll / Kujou Group Boss Assassination Case
Gaiden Mouta Cuticle Gakuen Nyuugaku / Cuticle Life 13 Nen Mae no Baka Musuko / Gaiden Bar Ragdoll / Cuticle Life 10 Nen Mae no Baka Musuko / Kujougumi Kumichou Ansatsu Jiken
